mapper.insert: insert into customer(cid, cname, cpw, cage, cgender, cnick_name, cemail, ctel, cadd)values(#{cid}, #{cname}, #{cpw}, #{cage}, #{cgender}, #{cnick_name}, #{cemail}, #{ctel}, #{cadd})
mapper.select: select * from customer where cid = #{cid} and cpw = #{cpw}
mapper.delete: delete from customer where cid = #{cid} and cpw = #{cpw}
